-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseprojectdlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


--abfss protocol
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseprojectdlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


--examine data types for the columns
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseprojectdlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0''
    ) AS [result]'


--To find max lenght of data in a column
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationId)) as len_locationId,
     MAX(LEN(Borough)) as len_borough,
      MAX(LEN(Zone)) as len_zone,
       MAX(LEN(service_zone)) as len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseprojectdlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


--use WITH clause to provide explicit data types
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseprojectdlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]


--check whether datatypes got applied as modified
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseprojectdlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0''
    )
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]'


--to see default collation
SELECT name, collation_name from sys.databases;


--specify utf-8 collation for varchar (1st method)
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseprojectdlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )
    WITH(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    ) AS [result]

--specify collation at  database level(2nd method)
create DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

use nyc_taxi_discovery;

alter DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
